about_the_game:
Kurama and The Cursed Isles is an adventure and Platformer Game. Your ship ran aground after a terrible storm. Explore and Discover why the islands of the Archipelago are cursed and help the people. With Kurama and his most trustful little friend Aya, you have to complete 2.5D platformer levels and explore 4 islands which are little opened areas.

A 2.5D Platformer Game ! Use the Dash system to help you finish the levels. They are separated in season themed (Spring, Summer, Autumn, WInter) with challenges, trap and enemies according of the season. Giant flower, mudflood, blizzard or even lava, do not be afraid to explore the level to find items and treasures.

And 3D opened areas ! It is not just a simple Hub area to go from a level to another. Speak to the people of the islands, resolve little quests, unlock new platformer levels and secrets, purify the island, and collect treasures.

Make your way to the source of evil to destroy it.
